subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The three-time Pro Bowl linebacker LaVar Arrington was released from a hospital two weeks after breaking his right arm and severely cutting his leg in a motorcycle accident. His lawyer said Arrington had a slight limp from a gash in his left leg and was still recovering from a broken arm, but there was no timetable for his full recovery.
